description: Variation of condition 1 of listed building consent dated 9 December 2020 (RN20/04548/LBC) (which itself varied conditions 1, 2 and 3 of listed building consent dated 28 January 2020 (RN19/08727/LBC)), listed building consent dated 25 June 2019 (RN19/02708/LBC) and listed building consent dated 14 February 2017 (RN16/11963/LBC) for 'Refurbishment of Quadrangle Building and Quadrangle Surface including removal and replacement of roof of the Quadrangle Building and replacement of existing surface treatment, alterations to external eastern elevation, introduction of a protruding lightwell structure within Quadrangle Surface, removal and replacement of existing lightwell structures adjoining the King's Building and associated structural works to the adjacent balustrading, the removal and replacement of the King's Building exterior entrance steps, works to the Somerset House East Wing lightwell including removing and replacing balustrading and associated works. namely, to allow alteration to the angle of the glazing covering the top of the lightwell at the ground floor level; adjustment to the position of the lightwell and extension of the length of the glazed protection handrails; removal of small sections of masonry wall at the Basement -1 level to provide side access to the lightwells, and internal adjustment to the layout of the WCs in one of the lightwells; the addition of louvres to the lightwell facades and change to vertical curtain wall glazing in lightwells; notches into the fabric of the King's Building at a high level at basement level -2 to support replacement structural slabs; and amendments to services.'  Namely, to vary the approved drawing numbers to increase the demolition of the existing slab for the installation of the permitted oculus lightwell and reconfiguration of the permitted design of pre-cast concrete surrounding existing pipes within the Somerset House East Wing Lightwell.
decision_conditions: LB Ext and Int works to match existing
LBC works in accord with apprvd plans
